text: 20d Generation : Subs/functions : * Easier to manage : code organized into functions * minimises code duplication (we get code reuse!) :I;INT "I can draw Stars" do call DrawStars INPUT "Do you want another go Yes/No" , x WHILE X = "Yes* END 9 =37 Function DrawStars [ el g n INPUT "How many stars do you want draw: ", 3 g 5 FORI=1TON }O &S PRINT“** o Next| - © End function
